title: direct x error
body: after champ select it puts up an error ''unknown direct x error has occurred and league of legends cannot start'' i have tried deleting the  'game.cfg' and 'input.txt' files and then the lol_game_client and lol_game_client_en_us files and used repair. didnt work. updated my drivers still dosnt work help.{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
DirectX errors usually indicate there are missing files in your DirectX locale. You should be able to resolve this by running all available windows updates before running the [**DirectX Web Installer**](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=35) to grab all missing DirectX packages.

Let me know if this helped.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=2TE0inb8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-06T05:55:10.542+0000)
>
> DirectX errors usually indicate there are missing files in your DirectX locale. You should be able to resolve this by running all available windows updates before running the [**DirectX Web Installer**](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=35) to grab all missing DirectX packages.
> 
> Let me know if this helped.

I did what you said and i still recieve the error.

Has anyone solved the direct X problem that when entering game it crashes and gives you a message saying that drivers may be outdated I have already updated all my drivers and tried re installing league i have just bought my 2000$ ibuypower computer to play and stream league but i cant even play i even skin boosted for my aram game and i dont even get to play in it

This BullShit still happens... It pisses me off so much of why this high caliber game problem still exists... 
Riot, you take alot of money from people and this type of problem still exists? Fix it or i'm gonna be really pissed off to the point of doing something drastic about it...{{champion:122}}
